speaker: YOU
text: I'm investigating the death in room 214. Eleanor Marlowe.

speaker: CLERK
text: The police already came and went. Said it was suicide. Case closed.

speaker: YOU
text: I'm not the police. Her sister hired me. I need to see that room.

speaker: CLERK
text: I'm not supposed to let anyone up there…

speaker: YOU
text: Twenty dollars says you can make an exception.

speaker: CLERK
text: …Second floor. End of the hall on the right. The key's missing but the door's unlocked. Police were sloppy.
